title: Twilight Knight
subTitle: Human Hero
flavorText: None know from where the Twilight Knights originate. Some whisper that they come from the Dark Realm itself, and that they are the last and only Heroes from that benighted realm. For their part, Twilight Knights reveal nothing. Appearing only when situations are at their most dire, they drive back the shadows only to disappear as silently as they arrived.

abilities.name: Gloom Shatter
abilities.definition: DANGEROUS, Aura 2, Reduce all offense rolls made in the aura by 1st. Twilight Knight is not affected by gloom shatter.

abilities.name: Lamplight
abilities.definition: Wave 5, Destroy all traps and creeps.
